Sony’s latest full-frame compact camera, the RX1R III, is officially available in Malaysia. The camera will set you back an eye-watering RM20,999. Coming a full decade after its predecessor, the RX1R II, t he RX1R III features improved hardware and features throughout. Such improvements include a larger 61MP full-frame Exmor R back-illuminated CMOS sensor, marking […]

items.title: Apple’s latest M4 MacBook Air lineup returns to some of its best prices ever at $200 off via Amazon, deals from $799
items.summary:
They’re back folks. After jumping up to nearly full price across the board, Amazon has now knocked $200 off just about every current-generation M4 MacBook Air ahead of the first batch of iPhone 17 deliveries later this week. items.title: dbrand’s anti-yellow clear case, ‘idiot-proof’ screen protector, more now available for iPhone 17
items.summary:
Apple has officially unveiled the iPhone 17 lineup, and if you’re planning a preorder, you’ll want a case ready to protect it from day one. dbrand, as usual, is ahead of the curve – its new collection for the iPhone 17 actually went live days before Apple’s announcement. The lineup includes the updated Ghost 2.0 case, which dbrand guarantees won’t turn yellow over time like many other clear cases do. There’s also the fan-favorite Grip case for folks looking to get a customizable model with ultra-grippy sides. To round things out, dbrand is also offering its Prism Screen Protectors that fit right in with its cases. Hit the jump for a closer look and more details.

more…

Buy for $16 (Reg. $30)

What we love

A lot of MagSafe power banks out there lean into a plastic construction, but not this one. You’re looking at an aluminum shell that measures just 0.37 inches thick. I like that there are indicators along the side to quickly let you know how much battery is left.
